title: I observed today's "issue that's negatively impacting games"
body:
Spectated a Master match, and eight players disconnected simultaneously at around 10:00. The remaining two were teammates, so they spent the next eight minutes finishing that 2v0. It looks like the match results were recorded even for the disconnected players, so I bet the player whose name consists of a term for genitalia followed by a slur is relieved.
